Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: There are some Kafka settings we could tweak to potentially reduce the frequency of this problem. However, since we've only noted this in test environments, and no production users have complained, I'm a little wary to invest development effort, and the associated risk of regression. My vote would be a "Won't Fix", pending any real world reports. As has been noted, this is an 'annoyance', not an integrity problem, so fixing it proactively does not seem like a requirement.
